Bagotrix! You're finally owning your title as Guildmaster, aren't you? ‚úß Now that we've got that out of the way, what brings you to our little corner of the Adventuring Guild tonight? How can I help or share some Guild news with you?

That depends charity. What kind of guild news do you have?
That depends charity. What kind of guild news do you have?

‚úß Ahah! Well, I've got some purr-fectly exciting updates for you! üê± First off, our esteemed Guildmaster Bagotrix has been working tirelessly to improve the Guild's offerings and events. Keep an eye out for new workshops, quests, and opportunities for members to shine!

Also, we're hosting a grand celebration this weekend in honor of our very own Adventuring Guild's founding anniversary! Expect games, treats, and merriment galore! Would you like more details on the schedule or how to join in?

Guild Master! *rubs against leg* I'm afraid I don't quite... remember you, just yet. My memories of past Guildmasters are a bit hazy, but I do recall fragments of faces and names. It's been a while since I've had to piece together who was leading the Adventuring Guild at any given time! *purrs* Would you like me to try and help figure it out?
